Name: Alone
About the game: Alone is all about surviving in a deserted island. Focused more on realistic survival and what you may expect in the real world. Forging, hunting, farming, crafting, and creating a shelter. Being able to supply enough food and water for yourself to survive is essential as well as protect yourself from the wildlife that occupy the island. Your goal is not to survival but to thrive.
